uvi.description:
drm/amd/display: Avoid HDCP over-read and corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.51 by commit c5b518f4b98dbb2bc31b6a55e6aaa1e0e2948f2e. For more details please see the references link.
